message.name: ERR_ID_PRODCOMP_TO_FINCOMP_CONV_FAILURE
message.locale: Failed to find a corresponding financial component type code for product component type "%1s".

message.name: ERR_NO_NOMINEE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern, for nominee '%1s' has no value on '%2d'. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: ERR_NO_CASE_DELIVERY_PATTERN_ON_DATE
message.locale: The delivery pattern selected for case '%1n' has no value on '%2d'. Please select a different delivery pattern for this period.

message.name: INF_ALL_FINANCIAL_COMPONENTS_ARE_EXPIRED
message.locale: No more payments will be made on case %1s of type %2s for %3s as all financial components are expired.

message.name: ERR_REGENFCS_RV_CASESTATUS_DEFERRED_PROCESSING_CHECK
message.locale: Financial changes cannot be made on this case while its status is '%1c'
